about_the_game:
YARG: Prologue is a one-screen rage platformer that wants you to succeed! Will you rise up to the challenge, or fail like the rest of them?

...I think you can do it.

Gameplay!

Jump, die, die, die and die to (eventually) overcome devilishly difficult tests. Avoid all manner of obstacles so you can get paid advance scientific process!

Features!

  • 7 one-screen levels that allow you to plan the perfect path through them as soon as you see them.
  • A short-and-sweet-yet-challenging experience!
  • Rage Mode, unlocked after your first playthrough, in which you must beat the entire game with only 6 lives.
  • Designed for keyboards, but playable with controllers.
  • A short, self-contained story that ties into the larger plot of YARG! Wowza!!

content_descriptors.notes: When you die there are red 7x7 squares that represent blood (can be disabled in the options menu before starting the game)
